description: One digital microscope for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency
full_summary:
# Federal Government Tender Announcement
### RFP Number: WS3897616953
#### Tender for a Digital Microscope

**Tender Details**
- **Tender Publication Date:** 2023-03-16
- **Tender Closure Date:** 2023-04-13, 14:00 EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-04-28

**Procurement Overview**
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is seeking a single bidder for the supply and delivery of a digital microscope. The instrument is required for seed identification and seed testing purposes in the ministry.

**Procurement Categories**
- **UNSPSC:** 41111700 - Viewing and observing instruments and accessories
- **Trade Agreements:** The procurement is subject to the following international trade agreements:
    - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
    - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Deliverables**
The successful bidder must supply and deliver one (1) digital microscope within the specified deadlines. The microscope will be deployed at the Saskatoon Laboratory and will be used by highly-trained analysts for seed identification and testing purposes.

**Contact Information**
- **Matt Keenan**, Purchasing Agent, Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
- **Email:** matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15723370?extsite=MTU3MjMzNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Important Information**
- Bids must be submitted electronically, and all required supporting documentation must be included with the bid submission.
- All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT on the tender closure date will be deemed non-responsive.

By following this announcement, you will be notified about the implementation of the project with the view of creating and maintaining a compilation of electronic project records, drafting content of passing information, updating the document and conducting a critical review.  
It allows multiple parties  to have access to the same information via a portable device.“
(Changed the end) 
This is our rewritten government tender announcement that adheres to a professional tone. Note the restructured format to make it easier to consume
